Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":415310,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2/first day.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2/first day.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"first day.PNG\",\"name\":\"first day.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":881,\"height\":285},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Now that you are aware of the Day 1 onboarding schedule, here is what your first looks like â€“\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We start off with Joining formalities, which includes filling the documents and signing the NDA contract during the first half of the day.\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You will be taken through an induction session, which aims to help you integrate into EPAM. You'll have a brief introduction to EPAM, its internal tools, and policies.\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Final step for your first day is to meet your Resource Manager. You will be informed about the plan for the upcoming days, regarding practice onboarding and project onboarding.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
